EmailTemplate.name: First Defect Notice NINTEX
EmailTemplate.subject: First Defect Notice: {!Rejection__c.Application_Type__c} Application# {!Rejection__c.Registration_Number__c} for {!Rejection__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The application for {!Rejection__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} has been reviewed and defected for not meeting all of the requirements. Please review the attached First Defect Notice, which lists each specific defect in your application.
You are required to complete the requested adjustments to your application and re-submit it within 30 days from the date of this email, applications not resubmitted will be eligible for closure.
To log in and make changes, please visit https://cadir.my.site.com/registrations.
Please follow the steps below:
Log in to your dashboard and click update under the license number. Provide the requested information. Go to the "Submission" section. Select "Yes" to the question "Resubmit Application due to Pending Defect". Click <Submit>.
Sincerely, Licensing & Registration Labor Commissioner's Office Department of Industrial Relations State of California
